participant_1.name: Sarah
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and passionate about education, enjoys cultural experiences and values storytelling.
participant_1.background: I love to read the bible before I go to bed. I love to go to the symphony orchestra. My favorite brand of clothing is Donna Karen. I am a middle school teacher for 8th grade.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, with a quirky sense of humor and a slight edge of anxiety about life's deeper questions.
participant_2.background: I am obsessed with filming. Sometimes, people worry I am crazy. I am a very bad liar. I try not to think about death.

content.text: Hi! I'm an 8th grade teacher. What do you do for work?
I'm a filmmaker.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of films do you make?
I mostly make documentaries.
That's awesome! I love documentaries.
Thanks! I'm glad to hear that.
So, what are some of your favorite documentaries?
I really liked "Amy" about Amy Winehouse.
Me too! That was a great documentary.
I also liked "Man on Wire" about Philippe Petit.
Oh, I haven't seen that one yet. I'll have to check it out.
It's a really good one.
So, what's your favorite thing about filmmaking?
I love the storytelling aspect of it. I love being able to tell a story in a visual way.
That makes sense. I can see how that would be rewarding.
It is! It's so much fun to be able to create something that people can watch and enjoy.
So, what's your next project?
I'm not sure yet. I'm still in the process of developing it.
That's exciting! I can't wait to hear more about it.
Thanks! I'll keep you updated.
